Package net.sf.appia.core

Appia core.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AppiaConfig Interface AppiaConfig
To use this, just change the value of the specific variable and recompile this interface and the code that uses the variable.
TimeProvider Appia interface, that should be used by all Appia enteties to obtain the current time.
 

Class Summary
AbstractAppiaRunnable This class defines a AbstractAppiaRunnable
Appia Appia main class.
AppiaMBeanContainer  
Channel A Channel is an instance of a QoS.
ChannelCursor A ChannelCursor is the way of accessing the Channel Sessions stack.
ChannelEventRoute The route an Event will take through the Channel.
Direction The direction an Event will take.
Event The class Event is the superclass of all events manipulated by Appia.
EventQualifier Class that contains the values for the qualifiers of events.
EventScheduler Title: Appia
Layer This class defines a Layer.
ManagementServerFactory This class defines a ManagementServerFactory
QoS This class defines a QoS.
QoSEventRoute This class defines a QoSEventRoute
Session This class defines a Session
TimerManager Appia timers manager.
 

Exception Summary
AppiaCursorException Thrown when an exception ocurs in ChannelCursor manipulation.
AppiaDuplicatedSessionsException Thrown when a Session appears twice (or more) in the same Channel.
AppiaEventException Thrown when an exception ocurs during Event manipulation.
AppiaException Superclass of all Exceptions thrown by Appia
AppiaInvalidQoSException Thrown when the desired QoS is invalid.
 

Error Summary
AppiaError Superclass of all Errors thrown by Appia.
 

Package net.sf.appia.core Description

Appia core. This package contains the core, kernel, classes of the Appia framework.
